name: Peon scred life: Frontier
description:
PEON SCRED LIFE : FRONTIER

Hi everyone ! 

Here we are with our first game made during a gamejam !
If you like undercover games, this game is for you ! Your main goal will be to succeed to cross a frontier 4 times ! Be carefule the guards are more and more aware ! 

HOW TO PLAY ?

You can see the all the controls by pressing  P. You can even change with your own keys !

You can crouch, jump, go upstair and downstair,desactive alarm....and more things !

WHAT'S ABOUT THE GAMEPLAY ?

As I said previously, you have to cross a frontier with multiple characters (the same actually, but at the beginning this was the idéal...no time enough :) ). Once you succeed a lever, the difficultiy increase by adding guards. Be carefull to stay out of their cone of view or it could be terrible !!  

Tips 1 : try to crouch or find a desactivator if you dont succeed to cross a light :)

Tips 2 : if you want to be the BEST adventurer try to catch all stars in each level !

ENJOY ! :)

A bigger game is currently under development...stay connected !
